name: settle-sdk-node
description: An easy to use SDK for Node.js with all the best practices to kickstart your integration with the Settle Payment Platform.

scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run cover
scripts.prepublish: npm run clean && npm run lint && npm run test && npm run build && git add -A
scripts.publish:prerelease: npm run clean && npm run lint && npm run test && git commit -am 'Upgrade to %s' && npm version prerelease -m 'Upgrade to %s' && git push && npm publish
scripts.publish:prepatch: npm run clean && npm run lint && npm run test && git commit -am 'Upgrade to %s' && npm version prepatch -m 'Upgrade to %s' && git push && npm publish
scripts.publish:preminor: npm run clean && npm run lint && npm run test && git commit -am 'Upgrade to %s' && npm version preminor -m 'Upgrade to %s' && git push && npm publish
scripts.publish:premajor: npm run clean && npm run lint && npm run test && git commit -am 'Upgrade to %s' && npm version premajor -m 'Upgrade to %s' && git push && npm publish
scripts.publish:patch: npm run clean && npm run lint && npm run test && git commit -am 'Upgrade to %s' && npm version patch -m 'Upgrade to %s' && git push && npm publish
scripts.publish:minor: npm run clean && npm run lint && npm run test && git commit -am 'Upgrade to %s' && npm version minor -m 'Upgrade to %s' && git push && npm publish
scripts.publish:major: npm run clean && npm run lint && npm run test && git commit -am 'Upgrade to %s' && npm version major -m 'Upgrade to %s' && git push && npm publish

author: Christian Wick <christian@settle.eu>
